        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eln:demoportal</catalog>
            <entry>4179</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">Misurare la resistenza</string>
            <string language="en">Measure resistance</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Maßwiderstand</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Résistance de mesure</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Resistência da medida</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντίσταση μέτρου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Resistencia de la medida</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Come varia la resistenza elettrica (ohm) nei differenti componenti di un impianto elettrico? Impara a misurarla.</string>
            <string language="en">What is the electrical resistance (ohm) in different electronic parts? Learn to measure it.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">ohm</string>
            <string language="en">ohm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">resistenza</string>
            <string language="en">resistance</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Was ist der elektrische Widerstand (Ohm) in den 
unterschiedlichen elektronischen Teilen? Erlernen Sie, es zu 
messen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Quelle est la résistance électrique (ohm) dans 
différentes composantes électroniques ? Apprenez à la 
mesurer.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Que é a resistência elétrica (ohm) nas peças 
eletrônicas diferentes? Aprenda medi-lo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ποια είναι η ηλεκτρική αντίσταση (ωμ) στα διαφορετικά 
ηλεκτρονικά μέρη; Μάθετε να τον μετράτε.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Cuál es la resistencia eléctrica (ohmio) en 
diversos componentes electrónicos? Aprenda medirlo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ohm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Widerstand</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ohm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">résistance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ohm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">resistência</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ωμ</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αντίσταση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ohmio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">resistencia</string>
          </keyword>
